content: f132 rainbow showers - crochet lys day 2019 by dana fiddes lys day 2019 pattern - not to be sold online for brick-and-mortar shops only until 1/1/20 all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 4/27/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2019 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 1 of 2 f132 size row 3 single_crochet double_crochet in 1st st * single_crochet in next st double_crochet in following st 13 wide x 54 long repeat from * to last 2 sts single_crochet in next st double_crochet single_crochet in last st chain 1 turn two sts increased 7 sts materials manos del uruguay fino 70% extrafine merino 30% silk repeat row 3 until you have 91 sts changing to color b at the approx 100g/490 yds 2 mini-skein kits beginning of a row when you run out of a shown in kit #16 sybil 444 topsy-turvy a 430 gilt b 443 turkish delight c 431 chemise d row 4 single_crochet double_crochet in first st * single_crochet in next st double_crochet in following st 425 fascinator e and repeat from * to last two sts decrease over last two sts chain 1 kit #6 flora 423 tincture f 407 velvet pincushion g 408 turn 91 sts crystal goblet h 404 watered silk i 433 folly j row 5 decrease over first two sts * double_crochet in next st single_crochet in us e crochet hook 3 5mm or size to obtain gauge following st repeat from * to last st double_crochet single_crochet in last st chain 1 tapestry needle turn 91 sts gauge repeat row 4-5 changing to colors c d e etc at the beginning 18 sts and 19 row = 4 in stitch pattern of a row as necessary abbreviations when you have worked 11 row of color i begin row 6 chain chain double_crochet double_crochet row 6 decrease over 1st two sts * double_crochet in next st single_crochet in single_crochet single_crochet following st repeat from * to last 3 sts double_crochet in next st decrease st s stitch es over last 2 sts two sts decreased chain 1 turn 89 sts repeat repeat decrease single_crochet two stitches together repeat row 6 changing to color j when necessary until 5 sts remain instructions with a chain 4 row 7 decrease over 1st two sts double_crochet in next st decrease over last 2 sts 3 sts row 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook double_crochet in next chain single_crochet in last chain chain 1 turn 3 sts break yarn and fasten_off row 2 single_crochet double_crochet in first st single_crochet in next st double_crochet single_crochet in last st chain 1 finishing turn two sts increased 5 sts weave in ends steam block to finished measurements all efforts were made to make this pattern error-free for questions or support please email info@fairmountfibers com 4/27/19 © fairmount fibers ltd 2019 not to be reproduced or re-knit for profit page 2 of 2
